chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Monte A. Bartelt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault), a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
10:40 a.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court with attorney Sharon Mae Gisselman.  Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties in receipt of PSI - Gisselman has reviewed with Defendant - report is factually correct. Victim J.B. statement on sentencing. Court statement to reporters in courtroom. T.A. statement to sentencing. Gisselman objection to T.A.'s statement relating to Defendant's daughter's letter - Court sustains objection relating to letter - case is still pending. T.A. further statement. Schiek/Gisselman/Defendant/Court statement sentencing.
Court Sentence
Prison - 30 years
Initial Confinement - 14 years
Extended Supervision - 16 years
Credit - 97 days
No contact with victim or victim's family 
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO
Appeal rights given. WEDS given. NADVI given.
Adj. 11:39 a.m.
Court reinstates no contact with Tammy Anderson whatsoever or JNB

11:41 a.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court, in custody, with attorney Sharon Mae Gisselman. Michael William Schiek, D.A., appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek requests presentence investigation. Defendant pleads no contest. Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea; waiver free and voluntary. Court finds factual basis exists for plea and finds defendant guilty of Ct. 1. Court orders PSI. Schiek statement--monitored letters/requests original bond condition no contact with Tammy Anderson whatsoever. Court orders no contact with Tammy Anderson or JNB reinstated. Bond continued.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.

3:11 p.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court with attorney Sharon Mae Gisselman.  Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Gisselman statement to resolution - believes they are close - requests Plea hearing - Bail continued. Adj. 3:13 p.m.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 23, 2015 at 11:00 am.
States Reply to Discovery
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery

1:34 pm. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court with attorney Sharon Mae Gisselman.  Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Schiek statement - no agreement - discovery still needs to be provided - new search warrant signed - waiting for results. Bail continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 17, 2015 at 03:00 pm.
of no contact - writing, telephone, face-to-face

3:00 p.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court, in custody/via video, with attorney Sharon Mae Gisselman. Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of Preliminary Examination filed. Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. Court advises counsel/defendant of his right to be here in person; counsel states she met prior with defendant at the jail -- both waive his appearance in person. Court finds waiver of appearance by defendant free & voluntary. Gisselman statement -- assuming charges remain same on Information, defendant pleads not guilty. Court advises counsel she has 15 days to object to Information once filed. Bond continued. 
  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

3:06 p.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court, via video, in custody.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant states PD's office has appointed Maggie Hogan.  Attorney Hogan is in court - she has not been appointed - there is potential conflicts with their office. Court advises Attorney Hogan that phone appearance for pd will be allowed.  Bond continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 3:00 p.m. Adj. 3:08 p.m.
Adjourned initial appearance at 08-20-2015 03:00 pm
No contact with minor J.N.B or mother of J.N.B. No intoxicants, no taverns.

1:29 p.m. Defendant Monte A. Bartelt in court, via video, in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   In receipt of complaint, right to counsel - defendant has contacted PD's office and is eligible, Schiek/Defendant statement to bail - Court sets $ cash bond.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
